snippet.title: SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! | Release Teaser (Website)
snippet.description:
Let’s go, New Kid! SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! is OUT NOW on PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch!

Grab up to three friends, in this four-player co-op, and battle your way through the snow-piled town of South Park on a quest and enjoy a day without school.
